name: Delivery Drifter
description:
Drive. Deliver. DRIFT!!

Make deliveries in a city that never sleeps.

You are the delivery drifter. You make deliveries throughout the day and you do it in style. Now drop off your packages ASAP

Controls

WASD - Move around

Driver Tips

1.  Try to control your speed. Don't floor it all the time or you'll miss key turns. 

2.  Anticipate turns early. Try to hit the turn at an angle.

3. Don't forget your powerups. Blue lightning bolts give you speed, and shields give you... shield

4. Get extra time by getting there quick. Each destination you reach gives you 3 additional seconds.

5. Use alleys as shortcuts.

Soundtrack

1. Montego Sunset - The Menahan Street Band

2. Make the Road By Walking - The Menahan Street Band

3. NY Rush - The Seatbelts

4. Road of the Lonely Ones - Madlib

Additional assets used:

Water shader by seven 2

Small Town America streets

Magicpot Effect textures and prefabs
